title: Doggo
subtitle: Learning how to build Next.js apps
intro: This is my very first Next.js application and it thought me a lot. It used at the time experimental App Router, server components, and Tailwind CSS for styling.
Tech: Vercel, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Serverless Functions

paragraphs: I built this website in order to get a job at Tendro, and it thought me so much about modern web development.
The website fetches pictures/videos of cute dogs from an external API and displays them. I tried to make the website cute as well.

cta.title: Wanna get in touch?
cta.body: I'm always open to discussing anything related to what I'm building.
